sentences.en: Both of these women have strong memories of the Vietnam War.
sentences.cn: 这两位妇女都对越南战争记忆深刻.

sentences.en: Dioxin was the ingredient in Agent Orange, used to defoliate Vietnam.
sentences.cn: 越南战场上用于毁灭林区的“橙剂”，其成分是二氧杂芑。

sentences.en: Facing total defeat in Vietnam, the French subsequently conceded full independence to Laos.
sentences.cn: 法国人在越南面临彻底的失败后，接着又让老挝取得了完全的独立。

sentences.en: He encouraged me to bag the safety of my present course, join the marines, and go to Vietnam, where at least I’d really learn something.
sentences.cn: 他鼓励我走出当前寻求安全庇护的路线，加入海军陆战队开赴越南，至少我在那里真的可以学到点东西。

sentences.en: He was a Vietnam veteran with a haunted mien.
sentences.cn: 他是个越战老兵,举止总有些惶然.

sentences.en: He was held prisoner in Vietnam from 1966 to 1973.
sentences.cn: 他在1966年到1973年间被作为战俘关押在越南。

sentences.en: His plane was shot down over North Vietnam in 1967.
sentences.cn: 他的飞机于1967年在北越被击落。

sentences.en: In the late 1970s Laos fell within the orbit of Vietnam and the Soviet Union.
sentences.cn: 20世纪70年代末，老挝被纳入了越南和苏联的势力范围。

sentences.en: Laos is on the west of Vietnam.
Money will also go into local development projects in Vietnam.
sentences.cn: 钱也会用于越南的地方发展项目当中。

sentences.en: The Vietnam conflict ultimately was lost.
The Vietnam War was just about to end.
sentences.cn: 那时越南战争就要结束了。

sentences.en: There have been growing signs of a ra-pprochement with Vietnam.
sentences.cn: 同越南恢复友好关系的迹象越来越明显了。

sentences.en: Vietnam has emerged as the world's third-biggest rice exporter.
sentences.cn: 越南已跃居世界第三大稻米出口国。

sentences.en: Vietnam made an official request that the meeting be postponed.
sentences.cn: 越南已经正式请求将会议推迟。
